<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>

  </identifier>

    <entry>70078</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:fizleti/120634</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:fizleti/120634</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Tok po plošči</string>
            <string language="en">Current carrying plate</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Aktuelle tragende Platte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Plat portant actuel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Placa carregando atual</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Piastra trasportante corrente</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παρόν φέρνοντας πιάτο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Placa que lleva actual</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">V prostor z enakomernim magnetnim poljem dodamo žice in z njimi tvorimo ploščat vodnik.</string>
            <string language="en">Many wires are placed next to each other in a uniform magnetic field in order to construct current carrying plate.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">magnetno polje</string>
            <string language="en">magnetic field</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">tokovna plošča</string>
            <string language="en">surface circuit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">amperov zakon</string>
            <string language="en">ampere's law</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Viele Leitungen werden nahe bei einander in ein 
konstantes magnetisches auffangen, um aktuelle tragende 
Platte zu konstruieren gelegt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Beaucoup de fils sont placés à côté de l'un 
l'autre dans un champ magnétique uniforme afin de construire le plat 
portant actuel.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Muitos fios são colocados ao lado de se em um 
campo magnético uniforme a fim construir a placa carregando atual.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Molti legare sono disposti vicino a vicenda in un
campo magnetico dell'uniforme per costruire la piastra trasportante
corrente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πολλά καλώδια τοποθετούνται το ένα δίπλα στο άλλο σε
ένα ομοιόμορφο μαγνητικό πεδίο προκειμένου να κατασκευαστεί το 
παρόν φέρνοντας πιάτο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Muchos alambres se colocan al lado de uno a en un
campo magnético uniforme para construir la placa que lleva actual.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">magnetisch fangen Sie auf</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">tauchen Stromkreis auf</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gesetz des Amperes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">champ magnétique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">circuit extérieur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">la loi de l'ampère</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">campo magnético</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">circuito de superfície</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">lei do ampère</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">campo magnetico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">circuito di superficie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">legge dell'ampère</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μαγνητικό πεδίο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κύκλωμα επιφάνειας</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">νόμος αμπέρ</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">campo magnético</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">circuito superficial</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ley del amperio</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
